title: FREE CYCLE FOR INWORK MEMBERS
description: We have prepared a bike for you. For you to gain mental calmness with the sea air… You can use it free of charge by getting the key from the consultation.

title: SHOWER FOR MEMBERS OF THE INWORK COWORKING SPACE
description: Good news for our members who start the day with sports or do sports during break times! INWORK members will also be able to use RunWell's showers. You can use two separate showers and dressing cabins for men and women by purchasing a ticket at the desk. Towels and shampoo will be provided by us.
